targets.query: select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE ($timeFilter and  is_wired != 'true' and site_name =~ /$Site$/) group by radio_proto
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE $timeFilter AND is_wired != 'true' and site_name =~ /$Site$/ group by channel

panels.title: Client per Wifi Channels - All APs

targets.query: select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE $timeFilter AND "is_wired" != 'true' and site_name =~ /$Site$/ group by oui

panels.title: Client MAC OUI Breakdown - All APs

targets.query: select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE ($timeFilter and  is_wired != 'true' and site_name =~ /$Site$/)

panels.description: This only works when 1 AP is selected.
panels.title: $host 2.4GHz Channel

panels.description: This only works when 1 AP is selected.

targets.query: SELECT "channel" FROM "uap_radios" WHERE ("device_name" =~ /^$host$/ AND "radio" = 'na') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device_name"

panels.title: 5GHz Radio Channel

targets.query: SELECT "mem_used" FROM "uap" WHERE ("name" =~ /^$host$/ AND "site_name" =~ /^$Site$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
SELECT last("num_sta") FROM "uap_radios" WHERE ("device_name" =~ /^$host$/ AND "radio" = 'na') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device_name"

panels.description: Devices TX / RX bytes per second grouped by OUI. RX on negative axis.

targets.query: SELECT derivative(sum("rx_bytes"), 1s) AS "Rx", derivative(sum("rx_bytes"), 1s) AS "Rx" FROM "clients" WHERE ("oui" = 'Htc' AND "is_wired" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "oui" fill(none)

panels.title: WIFI Traffic per Vendor (all AP in Site(s): $Site)
Users and Guests per AP band

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.description: RX is on the negative Axis.
panels.title: 5 GHz Traffic

panels.description: PPS on the ng band calculated in 30 second buckets. In is on the negative Axis.
